root.name: Star Wars Chess
root.description: Everytime a piece is taken on Star Wars Chess a little animation is displayed so go on take Vader with C-3PO and sit back and have a laugh.Light side 8 R2D2 Pawns 2 C-3PO Bishops 2 Yoda Rooks 2 Chewbacca Knights 1 Princess Leia Queen 1 Luke Skywalker King Dark side 8 Imperial Stormtrooper Pawns 2 Tusken Raider Bishops 2 Imperial walker Rooks 2 Jango Fett Knights 1 Darth Vader Queen 1 Palpatine King

similar_games.game: Archon: The Light and the Dark
Learn To Play Chess with Fritz & Chesster
